target_content: Reduce by at least 55% net GHG emissions compared to 1990 levels, by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Greenhouse Gas Emissions Reduction as it directly aims to reduce net GHG emissions.

target_content: Achieve climate neutrality by 2050
justification: This target is assigned to Climate Neutrality as it aims to achieve a balance between GHG emissions and removals.

target_content: Reach energy neutrality in the wastewater treatment sector by 2045
justification: This target is assigned to Energy Efficiency as it aims to reduce energy consumption in the wastewater treatment sector.

target_content: Double the current deployment rate of individual heat pumps, resulting in a cumulative 10 million units by 2027 and 30 million units by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Heating and Cooling as it aims to increase the deployment of heat pumps.

target_content: Bring online over 320 GW of solar photovoltaic by 2025 and almost 600 GW by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Solar Energy as it aims to increase the capacity of solar photovoltaic.

target_content: Increase the share of renewable energy in the heating and cooling sector by at least 1.1 percentage points as an annual average calculated for the period 2026 to 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Renewable Energy as it aims to increase the share of renewable energy in the heating and cooling sector.

target_content: Ensure that the total final energy consumption of all public bodies combined is reduced by at least 1.9% each year, when compared to 2021
justification: This target is assigned to Energy Efficiency as it aims to reduce energy consumption in public bodies.

target_content: Ensure that the average primary energy use of the entire residential building stock in EU Member States decreases by at least 16% compared to 2020 by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Energy Efficiency as it aims to reduce energy consumption in residential buildings.

target_content: Ensure that at least 3% of the total floor area of heated and/or cooled buildings owned by public bodies is renovated each year to be transformed into at least nearly zero-energy buildings
justification: This target is assigned to Building Renovation as it aims to renovate public buildings to increase energy efficiency.

target_content: Over this decade, the EU will need to install, on average, approximately 45 GW per year of PV to reach the share of 45% of energy coming from renewables set out in the REPowerEU Plan
justification: This target is assigned to Solar Energy as it aims to increase the capacity of solar photovoltaic.

target_content: Reduce greenhouse gas emissions from the transport sector by 90% by 2050
justification: This target is assigned to Transport Emissions Reduction as it aims to reduce GHG emissions from the transport sector.

target_content: Increase the share of renewable energy in the transport sector to at least 14% by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Renewable Energy as it aims to increase the share of renewable energy in the transport sector.

target_content: Set an indicative target for innovative renewable energy technology of at least 5% of newly installed renewable energy capacity by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Innovative Renewable Energy as it aims to increase the share of innovative renewable energy technologies.

target_content: Produce at least 40% of the Union’s annual consumption of strategic raw materials by 2030
thematic_area: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
justification: This target is assigned to Raw Materials Production as it aims to increase the production of strategic raw materials.

target_content: Recycle at least 25% of the Union’s annual consumption of strategic raw materials by 2030
thematic_area: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
justification: This target is assigned to Raw Materials Recycling as it aims to increase the recycling of strategic raw materials.

target_content: Increase the circular material use rate to 23% by 2030
thematic_area: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
justification: This target is assigned to Circular Economy as it aims to increase the circular material use rate.

target_content: Reduce waste generation by 50% by 2030
thematic_area: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
justification: This target is assigned to Waste Reduction as it aims to reduce waste generation.

target_content: Increase the recycling rate of municipal waste to 65% by 2030
thematic_area: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
justification: This target is assigned to Waste Recycling as it aims to increase the recycling rate of municipal waste.

target_content: Reduce the generation of food waste by 50% by 2030
thematic_area: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
justification: This target is assigned to Food Waste Reduction as it aims to reduce food waste generation.

target_content: Increase the use of recycled materials in packaging to 30% by 2030
thematic_area: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
justification: This target is assigned to Sustainable Packaging as it aims to increase the use of recycled materials in packaging.

target_content: Reduce the average CO2 emissions of new heavy-duty motor vehicles by 90% by 2040
justification: This target is assigned to Transport Emissions Reduction as it aims to reduce CO2 emissions from heavy-duty motor vehicles.

target_content: Increase the share of alternative fuels in the transport sector to at least 24% by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Alternative Fuels as it aims to increase the share of alternative fuels in the transport sector.

target_content: Deploy at least 3 million public charging points for electric vehicles by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Electric Vehicle Charging as it aims to increase the number of public charging points for electric vehicles.

target_content: Increase the share of sustainable aviation fuels in the aviation sector to at least 2% by 2025
justification: This target is assigned to Sustainable Aviation Fuels as it aims to increase the share of sustainable aviation fuels in the aviation sector.

target_content: Reduce the emissions from the maritime transport sector by 50% by 2050
justification: This target is assigned to Maritime Emissions Reduction as it aims to reduce emissions from the maritime transport sector.

target_content: Reduce the use of chemical pesticides by 50% by 2030
thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
justification: This target is assigned to Sustainable Agriculture as it aims to reduce the use of chemical pesticides.

target_content: Increase the share of organic farming to at least 25% by 2030
thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
justification: This target is assigned to Organic Farming as it aims to increase the share of organic farming.

target_content: Reduce the generation of food waste by 30% by 2025
thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
justification: This target is assigned to Food Waste Reduction as it aims to reduce food waste generation.

target_content: Increase the use of recycled materials in packaging to 30% by 2030
thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
justification: This target is assigned to Sustainable Packaging as it aims to increase the use of recycled materials in packaging.

target_content: Protect at least 30% of the EU’s land area and 30% of the EU’s sea area by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Habitat Protection as it aims to protect a significant portion of the EU's land and sea area.

target_content: Restore at least 25,000 km of free-flowing rivers by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to River Restoration as it aims to restore free-flowing rivers.

target_content: Plant at least 3 billion additional trees by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Reforestation as it aims to plant additional trees.

target_content: Reduce the use of chemical pesticides by 50% by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Sustainable Agriculture as it aims to reduce the use of chemical pesticides.

target_content: Increase the share of organic farming to at least 25% by 2030
justification: This target is assigned to Organic Farming as it aims to increase the share of organic farming.

target_content: Reduce the number of premature deaths caused by air pollution by 55% by 2030
thematic_area: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
justification: This target is assigned to Air Pollution Reduction as it aims to reduce premature deaths caused by air pollution.

target_content: Reduce the concentration of microplastics in the environment by 30% by 2030
thematic_area: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
justification: This target is assigned to Microplastics Reduction as it aims to reduce the concentration of microplastics in the environment.

target_content: Reduce the share of people chronically disturbed by transport noise by 30% by 2030
thematic_area: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
justification: This target is assigned to Noise Pollution Reduction as it aims to reduce the share of people chronically disturbed by transport noise.

target_content: Reduce the generation of waste by 50% by 2030
thematic_area: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
justification: This target is assigned to Waste Reduction as it aims to reduce waste generation.

target_content: Increase the recycling rate of municipal waste to 65% by 2030
thematic_area: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
justification: This target is assigned to Waste Recycling as it aims to increase the recycling rate of municipal waste.
